Keywords: Politician , S.W.O.R.D.
Real Name: Tyler Hayward
Special Powers
IF ONLY YOU HAD A LITTLE MORE VISION: Leadership. When Tyler Hayward uses it and succeeds, this turn he has "POWER: Move an adjacent friendly character up to half its speed value. If that character has the S.W.O.R.D. keyword, after resolutions it may make a close attack."

June 13, 2022
The Singularity
Can the adjacent friendly Tyler grants a move and close, also carry a friendly like Tyler during that move?
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Pseudo-friendly-Mind-Control on an only-20-point figure looks great at first glance, but his special requires a successful Leadership roll first - you're only getting it one out of every three turns, on average, and no guarantee it's the turn you needed it. I guess SHIELD TA, +1 to Action Total, and double-Incap for five range out of Stealth is enough to earn 20 points? I'll use him if the Sealed math makes it extremely obvious that he's needed, or if I pull Prime The Vision. Otherwise, back in the booster for Captain Windbreaker here.
May 3, 2022
Goop
The idea of course is that you have prime vision carry him around for his leadership and his power ability. By himself he is a terrible piece but when used right he's worth his value. SWORD isn't a very large team and he's the only leadership source for it.
April 12, 2022
Moonshinclix12
This slot could have been YellowJacket Pym, what a shame.
